example.parse: (NP (NOUN_PROP روبرتو) (NOUN_PROP مانشيني)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS استقال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN منصب) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))) (NP-TMP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الاسبوع) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الماضي)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN خوف) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN سلامة) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN عائلت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN تهديدات)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC_POSS مشجعي) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفريق)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يعاني) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC ازمة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مالية) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC حادة)))))))))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: following the threats by supporters of the team who is suffering severe financial crisis

example.arg: بعد تهديدات مشجعي الفريق الذي يعاني ازمة مالية حادة
